subject: p16672854
Findings: The patient is status post median sternotomy. In the interval since the prior study, there has been increase in the interstitial markings bilaterally and prominence of the hila suggesting moderate pulmonary edema. Small pleural effusion may also be present. Basilar opacities may relate to fluid overload however, infectious process is not excluded.
Impression: Moderate pulmonary edema. Possible small pleural effusion seen posteriorly on the lateral view. Underlying basilar infection not entirely excluded.
